#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {

        unsigned long long int  k,n;
        cin>>k>>n;
        unsigned long  long int  dp[n+1];
        dp[1]=0;
        dp[2]=1;
        for(unsigned long long int  i=3;i<=n;i++)
        {
            dp[i]=(i-1)*dp[i-1]+(i-2)*dp[i-2];
        }
        int c=0,mod;
        unsigned long long int num=dp[n];

        if(k<=9)
            mod=10;
           else if(k<=99)
            mod=100;
           else if(k<999)
            mod=1000;
        if(k==0 &&n==1)
            cout<<"1\n";
        else
        {
            while(num!=0)
       {


            if(num%mod==k)
                c++;
            num=num/10;

       }
       cout<<c<<endl;
        }


    }
    return 0;
}
